description: add or remove tag(s) to/from GCE instances

zone.description: the zone of the disk specified by source

tags.description: comma-separated list of tags to add or remove

pem_file.description: path to the pem file associated with the service account email

instance_name.description: The name of the GCE instance to add/remove tags.  Required if instance_pattern is not specified.

instance_pattern.description: The pattern of GCE instance names to match for adding/removing tags.  Full-Python regex is supported. See U(https://docs.python.org/2/library/re.html) for details. If instance_name is not specified, this field is required.
